text: alihp, lam, ra. (Napiye! Itu) vetamakum; manitarkalai avarkalutaiya iraivanin anumatiyaik kontu irulkaliliruntu veliyerrip pirakacattin pal nir kontuvaruvatarkaka i(v vetat)tai name um'mitu irakkiyirukkinrom; pukalukkuriyavanum, vallamai mikkonumakiya (allahvin) pataiyil (avarkalai nir kontuvaruviraka)
